entry.title: Building a personal site with Hexo and GitHub Pages on Mac
entry.content:
A challenge, no doubt

In this post, a brief overview of building a personal blog is recorded in case anyone who is also interested in the same as me, or in pursuit of efficient regeneration provided with device change or data migration for myself.

Intro

It has been long time since I want to have space to record my life, and until now Iâ€™ve finally started creating my personal website here.
